share on x mh maria (engelhaupt) heitmann. jun 11 at 9:04 am so many memories of you, my cousin, memories of many good times and family gatherings. you will be sadly missed!! comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jl joanne lanham. jun 11 at 8:23 am we are deeply sadden of the passing of our good friend and great customer buck. you will be truly missed! may the garden in heaven be everything that you always dreamed it would be! rip my dear friend! with deepest sympathy , joanne , marge, brenda & jason your friends at the lunchbox cafe. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x janice turczyn. jun 11 at 6:14 am we are going to miss you buck, my deepest sympathy to the family. just a wonderful man. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 12. 8:30 am - 11:30 am st hyacinth church. la salle, il, usget order flowers now for everett's visitation funeral massjun 12. 11:30 am st hyacinth church. la salle, il, usget order flowers now for everett's funeral mass wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe ptak funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
